results.content: Better than most courses out there.  Gets down and dirty immediately.  Most courses go through everything slowly with too much attention to details. this guy gets to the point without all the fat.
results.content_html: Better than most courses out there. Gets down and dirty immediately. Most courses go through everything slowly with too much attention to details. this guy gets to the point without all the fat.

results.content:
Thank You Vogislav for great course. The only thing i will change in the course is to add the matherials to the each part and every lesson not all together on the end because it is easier to track the separate files than all of them at once. Beside i've learned a lot in here the thing missing in that course was the external non relative data-bases connections what in my opinion is very important nowadays.
Great course and thank you once more.
Jakub Kruszyński

response.content: Hi, you can use for example "git history" extension in VS Code and get to files of any part of the course, because a commit is done after each video.
response.content_html: Hi, you can use for example "git history" extension in VS Code and get to files of any part of the course, because a commit is done after each video.

results.content: You are leaning Vue.js from A-Z but not how to put the pieces to together, so you will not be applied to make a website from this course. When you are learning stuff from A-Z you get a lot of useless function/info, that you will never use in making a beginner website.
